DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effect of a commercially available fermented dairy product containing probiotics (4 weeks, twice a day) on abdominal distension in IBS patients with constipation (IBS-C).
DOC.brief_title: A Single-centre, Randomised, Double-blind, Controlled, Parallel-group Study to Evaluate the Effect of a Fermented Dairy Product on Abdominal Distension, Digestive Symptoms and Rectal Sensitivity in Patients With Irritable Bowel Syndrome With Constipation (IBS-C)
